titleInfo.title: Documenting endangered oral histories of the Arctic: A proposed symbiosis for language documentation and oral history research, illustrated by Saami and Komi examples

bibliographicCitation.wels: Rießler, M.; Wilbur, J. (2017): Documenting endangered oral histories of the Arctic: A proposed symbiosis for language documentation and oral history research, illustrated by Saami and Komi examples. In: Erich Kasten; Katja Roller; Joshua Wilbur (Hrsg.): Oral history meets linguistics. Fürstenberg: Kulturstiftung Sibirien. (Exhibitions and Symposia, ). S. 31-64.
bibliographicCitation.dgps: Rießler, M. & Wilbur, J. (2017). In E. Kasten, K. Roller & J. Wilbur (Hrsg.), Oral history meets linguistics (S. 31-64). Fürstenberg: Kulturstiftung Sibirien.
